medicines.name: Paracetamol
medicines.precautions: Avoid alcohol; consult a doctor for liver/kidney disease.

medicines.name: Ibuprofen
medicines.precautions: Take with food; avoid if you have ulcers or kidney issues.

medicines.name: Amoxicillin
medicines.safeDosage: 500-875 mg every 8-12 hours (as directed by a doctor)
medicines.precautions: Complete the full course; avoid if allergic to penicillin.

medicines.name: Loratadine
medicines.precautions: Avoid in severe liver disease; consult a doctor during pregnancy.

medicines.name: Aspirin
medicines.use: Pain relief, fever reduction, blood thinning
medicines.precautions: Avoid in children (risk of Reyeâ€™s syndrome); consult for bleeding disorders.

medicines.name: Cetirizine
medicines.precautions: Avoid alcohol; consult a doctor if pregnant or breastfeeding.

medicines.name: Metformin
medicines.precautions: Avoid in kidney disease; monitor for lactic acidosis.

medicines.name: Omeprazole
medicines.precautions: Avoid long-term use; consult a doctor for severe liver disease.

medicines.name: Azithromycin
medicines.safeDosage: 500 mg on day 1, then 250 mg daily for 4 days
medicines.precautions: Avoid in severe liver disease; take on an empty stomach.

medicines.name: Naproxen
medicines.precautions: Take with food; avoid in heart or kidney disease.
